attributes.action: Stop the government from amending the human rights act
attributes.additional_details: Imposing mandatory vaccines and other mandatory draconian measures are against our human rights. We should have the right to body autonomy. Measures should be discussed in parliament without bias.
attributes.background: Stop the government from amending the human rights act and enabling them to enforce any draconian measures and mandate they wish.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607712
